response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, reflecting over $12,000 in investment, creativity, and expertise. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, I propose an offer of $15,000 for it. This price reflects not only the cost but also the potential benefits and enhancements it can bring to your life or business. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you would like to discuss further details. I look forward to the opportunity to share this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 15000}
